            position: 0,

            line: 1,
            column: 7,
            position: 6,

                    span: Span {
                        line: 1,
                        column: 14,
                        position: 13,

                    name: "$a",
                },
            ),

                SimpleVariable {
                    span: Span {
                        line: 1,

                        position: 17,

                    name: "$b",
                },
